cboCostEstimates.description: As posted on the website of the Clerk of the House on December 9, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: Estimated Pay-As-You-Go Effects of H.R. 5715, a bill to reauthorize the Morris K. Udall and Stewart L. Udall Trust Fund, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 187 (Monday, October 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GRIJALVA:
H.R. 5715.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
U.S. Const. art. I, sections 1 and 8.
[Page H5873]
title: To reauthorize the Morris K. Udall and Stewart L. Udall Trust Fund, and for other purposes.
